attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You must admit that "God Save the Queen" isn't the most inspiring anthem. I believe if we had an anthem which is more insipring it would instill a sense of national pride and patriotism in the youth of Britain.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/godsaveouranthem/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
